name: All the links
description: Put many, many links on your new tab page

move-to-first.description: Move the current tab to be the first in the current window

move-to-last.description: Move the current tab to be the last in the current window

move-to-left.description: Move the current tab one tab to the left in the current window

move-to-right.description: Move the current tab one tab to the right in the current window
